translation.en: I'm gonna talk to Parker about my promotion today.
translation.es: Voy a hablar con Parker sobre mi ascenso.

translation.en: And the worst- case scenario,
translation.es: En el peor de los casos, sales dos semanas antes que yo.

translation.en: you're two weeks ahead of me, you get a gorgeous little apartment in the Marais.
translation.es: En el peor de los casos, sales dos semanas antes que yo. Tienes un lindo apartamentito en Le Marais.

translation.en: What if I don't want to live in the Marais?
translation.es: ¿Y si no quiero vivir en Le Marais?

translation.en: We could live somewhere else then.
Yeah. Yeah?
We could go to Detroit.
- Detroit? - Yeah, you could meet my mom and dad.
translation.es: ¿A Detroit? Te presento a mis padres.

translation.en: You can meet my sister. She owns a bakery.
translation.es: Y a mi hermana. Tiene una panadería.

translation.en: - And she will make you fat. -
I have six hours before I have to go back to the hospital.
translation.es: Tengo seis horas antes de volver al hospital.

translation.en: You wanna go back into bed with me?
I do.
But I got back- to- back meetings all morning.
translation.es: Pero tengo reuniones toda la mañana.

translation.en: Too bad for you.
Yeah, I know. But I gotta get in.
translation.es: Sí, ya lo sé. Tengo que irme.

translation.en: There's probably already 25 people lined up outside the door, waiting.
translation.es: Ya debe de haber 25 personas esperando.

translation.en: Je vous aime.
I love when you speak French.
nging ] SATCOM check.
Echo Nine Three Victor Echo Two.  Ops Center.
This is safe house seven- R. We're open for business.
translation.es: Centro de Operaciones. La casa segura 7-R está abierta.

translation.en: Confirmed.
Any reservations?
Nothing in the registry.
Walk- ins? Not expected.
translation.es: ¿Gente sin reservación? No esperamos a nadie. Reconfirme en 3 horas.

translation.en: Reconfirm in three hours.
translation.es: No esperamos a nadie. Reconfirme en 3 horas.

translation.en: Understood.
THURSDAY, 1:53 PM
Matt. Your cell. Really?
Relax. I've got an encryption packet.
Well, you know me. I never relax.
translation.es: Cálmate, es una transmisión cifrada. Yo nunca me calmo.

translation.en: Watch the cholesterol, old man.
You sound like Miriam.
So, what's new in Cape Town? Nothing, nothing.
translation.es: ¿Qué dice Ciudad del Cabo? Nada, nada.

translation.en: I updated my Surveillance Target Analysis. It's complete now.
translation.es: Actualicé mi Análisis de Vigilancia. Está terminado.

translation.en: Yeah, that's an exit report. It's not due till you leave.
translation.es: Ese reporte se entrega al irte.

translation.en: Exactly. Exactly. And when-- when is that?
How long has it been?
Twelve months. Well, talk to me in another four.
translation.es: Doce meses. Háblame en otros cuatro.

translation.en: Je-- David, I'm-- I'm dying here.
What's happening with the post in Paris?
translation.es: David, me estoy muriendo aquí. ¿Qué pasó con el puesto en París?

translation.en: One slot and 37 applicants.
Every one of them with more field experience than you.
translation.es: Todos con más experiencia que tú.

translation.en: Okay, how am I supposed to get more experience?
I'm staring at four walls all day.
translation.es: Me paso todo el día encerrado.

translation.en: I got passed up on Rome, then Berlin.
translation.es: No me dieron Roma ni Berlín.

translation.en: You said yourself my evaluation was excellent.
Just put it in front of Whitford.
I know he'll see that I'm ready to go, I'm all in.
Matt, I know this has been hard, but it's the way the system works.
translation.es: Matt, ya sé que esto es duro, pero así funciona el sistema.

translation.en: Look, I'll talk to Whitford about Paris, but I can't promise anything.
translation.es: Hablaré con Whitford sobre París pero no te prometo nada.

translation.en: Look, I gotta go.
translation.es: Hablaré con Whitford sobre París pero no te prometo nada. Tengo que colgar.

translation.en: Don't worry. I'm looking after you, okay?
Yeah, I know. I know. I know.
This is not a negotiation.
It's 10 million.
You'll get the file, and if the money is not in the account by 3:00 p.m.,
translation.es: Le doy el archivo y si el dinero no está a las 3 p.m...

translation.en: I'll take it to another buyer.
How do we know that you won't do that anyway?
translation.es: ¿Cómo sabemos que no lo hará de todos modos?

translation.en: You don't.
Here you are, sir.
Alec. How are you?
Petrus. 1972.
- You look good. - I do, don't I?
So, how are things at MI6? The usual.
Same bureaucratic bullshit and appalling remuneration.
translation.es: Como siempre. Mucha burocracia, una paga espantosa.

translation.en: Life of a government man. Mm- hmm.
So--
The original file. Dates, transactions, names.
translation.es: El archivo original. Fechas, transacciones, nombres.

translation.en: A bargain at triple the price.
translation.es: Una ganga, aun si costara el triple.

translation.en: Take a look.
I've been waiting a long time for this.
Tobin. What's in that box...
is gonna make the world a smaller place for you-- for both of us.
translation.es: Eso volverá al mundo más chico para ti... ...para los dos.

translation.en: I got your account. You get your cut 24 hours after transaction.
translation.es: Tengo tu cuenta. Te daré tu parte 24 horas después de la venta.

translation.en: Some of our old bosses aren't going to be happy these files are out in the open.
translation.es: A nuestros viejos jefes no les encantará ver estos archivos.

translation.en: Do I make you nervous?
Always.
Good.
You want her?
Please listen to me.
I had nothing to do with this.
translation.es: Yo no tuve nada que ver.

translation.en: Stop.
Let's go.
Tobin, you have to believe me.
I knew nothing about any of that.
Did you know if anybody was following you? No.
I don't think anybody was following me.
translation.es: No, creo que nadie me estaba siguiendo.

translation.en: I swear on my life, Tobin, I had absolutely--
translation.es: Te juro que no tuve nada...

translation.en: Slow down.
We go in by foot.
Head towards the square.
We're heading west. Holland Street. Move, move.
translation.es: Vamos al oeste. A la calle Holland. ¡Rápido, rápido!

translation.en: Excuse me, sir.
My name is Tobin Frost.
C.I.A. HEADQUARTERS LANGELY, VIRGINIA
translation.es: CUARTEL GENERAL DE LA CIA LANGLEY, VIRGINIA

translation.en: Linklater.
When?
Lock down the consulate.
Get me a team in the situation room in five minutes.
translation.es: Trae un equipo al Salón de Estrategia.

translation.en: I want everything we got on Tobin Frost.  Yes, ma'am.
translation.es: Quiero todo sobre Tobin Frost. Sí, señora.

translation.en: Is it him? Yeah.
Whitford know? I'm on my way there now.
Sir, place your finger in there until I tell you to stop.  Thank you.
translation.es: Ponga su dedo ahí hasta que le diga que lo quite.

translation.en: So how long has he been playing in your backyard?
translation.es: ¿Cuánto tiempo lleva jugando en tu área?

translation.en: We're working to get you that answer right now.
- Meaning you don't know. - No, meaning we're looking into it.
translation.es: O sea que no sabes. Estamos investigando.

translation.en: The guy goes rogue. He spends nine years selling out the Agency to all takers.
translation.es: El tipo se rebela, pasa 9 años vendiendo la agencia a otros.

translation.en: To Russia, China, Iran, you name it.
translation.es: A Rusia, a China, a Irán.

translation.en: Guy's just not gonna prance into an American consulate without good reason.
translation.es: A Rusia, a China, a Irán. No va a ir al consulado sin una buena razón.

translation.en: All right! Listen up. Everybody off the phone.
Tobin Frost has just waltzed his way into a U.S. consulate in Cape Town, South Africa.
translation.es: Tobin Frost acaba de entrar... ...en un consulado americano en Ciudad del Cabo.

translation.en: Now this man without question is one of the most notorious traitors that we've got.
translation.es: Este hombre es uno de nuestros traidores más infames.

translation.en: Errington, call up his background profile.
Tobin Frost was recruited into the Agency in 1984.
translation.es: Frost fue reclutado por la agencia en 1984.

translation.en: He tested off the charts in aptitude for psychological fieldwork.
translation.es: Tenía excelente aptitud para trabajos sicológicos.

translation.en: His first assignment was in Lebanon in January 1985.
translation.es: Su primera misión fue en Líbano, en enero de 1985.

translation.en: Three months later, he captured and flipped a high- ranking Hezbollah leader.
translation.es: Tres meses después, capturó y volteó a un líder de Hezbollah.

translation.en: Over the next several years,
translation.es: Tres meses después, capturó y volteó a un líder de Hezbollah. En los siguientes años...

translation.en: Frost successfully questioned and recruited many high- value individuals.
translation.es: ...interrogó y reclutó a muchos individuos valiosos.

translation.en: He became known as an expert manipulator of human assets,
translation.es: Adquirió fama de ser un manipulador experto...

translation.en: and he literally rewrote Agency interrogation protocols.
Frost served in many active theaters, including Libya,
translation.es: Frost sirvió en muchos teatros, incluyendo Libia de 1995 a 1998...

translation.en: from 1995 to 1998, Jordan, '98 to 2000.
translation.es: Frost sirvió en muchos teatros, incluyendo Libia de 1995 a 1998... ...y Jordania de 1998 a 2000.

translation.en: During his tenure in Jordan, Frost was suspected of leaking information to Mossad,
translation.es: En Jordania sospecharon que le pasó información al Mossad...

translation.en: but nothing was confirmed.
Ten years ago, Frost went off the reservation completely.
translation.es: Hace 10 años, Frost abandonó la agencia.

translation.en: He currently has no allegiancs and is wanted for espionage on four continents.
translation.es: Actualmente no tiene lealtades... ...y lo buscan por espionaje en cuatro continentes.

translation.en: His last known sighting is Hamburg, Germany in 2011.
translation.es: Lo vieron por última vez en Hamburgo en 2011.

translation.en: You know, Harlan, we should interrogate Frost now.
Sweat him for everything he's got.
Once he's stateside, we have fewer options.
I have an interrogator in Yemen. Can be there in eight hours.
translation.es: Un interrogador puede ir de Yemen en 8 horas.

translation.en: I already have a team in Jo'burg that can be there in two.
translation.es: Mi equipo en Jo'burgo puede llegar en dos.

translation.en: We'll take Frost to the safe house, interrogate him there.
translation.es: Podemos interrogarlo en la casa segura.

translation.en: My people are fully capable of handling this.
This is Tobin Frost.
We'll go with Jo'burg.
You must turn around.
Help. Help.
Accident.
Housekeeping.
We have a last- minute reservation.
translation.es: Tenemos una reservación de última hora.

translation.en: E.T.A. for check- in? Sometime tonight.
translation.es: ¿Tiempo de llegada? Esta noche. Seguros Freeark.

translation.en: Freeark Insurance. Got it.
Hey, where are you?
Parker just handed me his oversight papers to finis.
translation.es: ¿Dónde estás? Parker me pasó unos reportes suyos.

translation.en: And his daughter Chloe's got the measles. You believe that?
translation.es: Su hija tiene varicela, ¿no es increíble?

translation.en: How long you gonna be out for? I don't know. I don't know.
translation.es: ¿Cuánto tiempo vas a estar? No sé. No sé.

translation.en: Okay. Well, look, I'm gonna dive into this,
and then, um, hopefully I can meet up with you later, okay?
translation.es: ...y si todo sale bien nos vemos luego, ¿sí?

translation.en: Yeah, that sounds good. Hey. Hey.
I love you. I love you too.
translation.es: Te quiero. Yo a ti también.

translation.en: Bye. Bye.
AIR FORCE BASE SWARTKOP JOHANNESBURG
Extraction team is in the air, sir.
translation.es: El equipo de extracción ya despegó.

translation.en: They should be on the ground within the hour.
I want that team in and out of the city in less than 12 hours.
translation.es: Que entren y salgan en 12 horas.

translation.en: - We're not even supposed to have a presence in Cape Town. -  Yes, sir.
translation.es: No deberíamos estar en Ciudad del Cabo.

translation.en: Any communication about Frost's whereabouts...
translation.es: Sí, señor. Toda comunicación sobre la ubicación de Frost es confidencial.

translation.en: is strictly need to know.
translation.es: Toda comunicación sobre la ubicación de Frost es confidencial.

translation.en: Sir, the extraction team's en route to the consulate now.
translation.es: El equipo de extracción se dirige al consulado.

translation.en: - Who's reaching out to seven- R? - Richards, ma'am.
I want the housekeeper briefed.
High- priority target is coming in. I want the house quiet.
translation.es: Va un blanco de alta prioridad. Necesito silencio.

translation.en: Under no circumstances should there be any communication until the team has left.
translation.es: Ninguna comunicación hasta que el equipo se vaya.

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.
5:37 AM, FRIDAY -  -
Yeah?
Account? You have a room?
Daniel Kiefer, Freeark Insurance. K- I- E- F- E- R.  Kiefer.
Freeark Insurance. K- I- E- F- E- R.
-  You are a go. -
You're good to go.
Hey, I'm Weston. Guest room?
Uh, it's right around the corner. Two rights and a left.
translation.es: Dos vueltas a la derecha y una a la izquierda.

translation.en: All the way back.
That's Tobin Frost.  Stay with him.
Let's go download our gear. Yes, sir.
translation.es: Quédate con él. Vamos por el equipo. Sí, señor.

translation.en: - Linen closet? - Down the hall. Just right at the end there.
translation.es: ¿Clóset de blancos? En el corredor. Al final del corredor.

translation.en: Kill all the surveillance cameras in this room.
translation.es: Apaga todas las cámaras de este cuarto.

translation.en: My name is Daniel Kiefer.
We were at the Farm together.
Technically, you were a year ahead.
I'm here to make you aware of your rights.
You're being held under a national security directive...
translation.es: Estás preso bajo una Directiva Nacional...

translation.en: which means you have none, but you know that.
translation.es: Estás preso bajo una Directiva Nacional... ...o sea que no tienes derechos.

translation.en: Towels. You need 600s. Those are... 350, 375 gram weight.
translation.es: Necesitan toallas de 600. Esas pesan 350, 375 gramos.

translation.en: You're gonna need 600s.
I want to know the reasons for you being in Cape Town.
translation.es: Quiero saber por qué estás en Ciudad del Cabo.

translation.en: I want you to name your resources,
translation.es: Quiero saber tus recursos, contactos, bienes...

translation.en: contacts, assets, everybody you've done business with, traded intel with,
translation.es: Quiero saber tus recursos, contactos, bienes... ...con quiénes hiciste negocios, a quiénes has vendido secretos...

translation.en: sold secrets to in the nine years since you betrayed your country.
translation.es: ...con quiénes hiciste negocios, a quiénes has vendido secretos... ...en los 9 años desde que traicionaste a tu país.

translation.en: Absolutely. Anything you want, Daniel.
translation.es: Claro. Lo que tú quieras, Daniel.

translation.en: Khalid Sheikh Mohammed lasted 20 seconds.
They had 600s.
translation.es: Khalid Sheikh Mohammed duró 20 segundos. Tenían toallas de 600.

translation.en: Is this legal?
Bring him down.
Bring him up.
How long was that?
All right. Take him down.
Bring him up!
Get me a knife.
Miller.
Get in there with Frost.
- Sir, all the security cameras are down. - Reboot.
I wanna see what's out there. Copy that.
Let's go, boys!
Go! Go! Go! Go!
Let's go! Move!
Velez, take this corner.
Ericksson, get the back elevator.
Pope, what do you got?
Sir, I see approximately 12 heavily armed men in perimeter two.
translation.es: Veo 12 hombres con armas pesadas en el perímetro dos.

translation.en: Okay, gents! Work four to add.
Two- by- two. Perimeter two.
Greer! Sir!
-  Ericksson! - Yes, sir!
Velez!
Velez!
I'm good!
Let's go, fellas.
-  Incoming! -  Grenade! Oh, God!
-  - Greer!
Start working back!
Velez, three- round bursts!
Velez, where's Greer? He's over there, sir.
translation.es: Velez, ¿dónde está Greer? Está allá, señor.

translation.en: Go, son.
This ain't a test. This is the real thing.
translation.es: Esto no es una prueba. Es de verdad.

translation.en: What are you gonna do?
You don't wanna try me.
Magazine! Let's go.
Velez! Stay there!
Listen to me! Stay there!
Son of a bitch!
Miller! Miller!
Miller!
Hey! Get in here!
Hey. Take these. Go watch him.
Hey.
translation.es: Oye, vienen por mí, pero me quieren vivo.

translation.en: They're here for me, but they want me alive. You, they'll kill.
translation.es: Oye, vienen por mí, pero me quieren vivo. A ti te matarán.

translation.en: You got one in the chamber?
It's okay. I remember my first posting.
translation.es: Tranquilo. Recuerdo mi primer puesto. Río de Janeiro.

translation.en: Rio de Janeiro. House like this.
translation.es: Recuerdo mi primer puesto. Río de Janeiro. Una casa así. Mujeres hermosas.

translation.en: Beautiful women. Not one single visitor. But I remember rule number one.
translation.es: Una casa así. Mujeres hermosas. Ni una visita, pero recuerda esto:

translation.en: You are responsible for your houseguest. I'm your houseguest.
translation.es: Tú eres responsable del invitado. Yo soy tu invitado.

translation.en: The clock is ticking. They gave you the keys.
translation.es: El tiempo está corriendo. Te dieron las llaves.

translation.en: Do your duty, son.
translation.es: El tiempo está corriendo. Te dieron las llaves. Cumple con tu deber.

translation.en: Shut up. Let me think.
You wanna be the guy that lost Tobin Frost?
translation.es: ¿Quieres ser el que perdió a Frost?

translation.en: Ticktock, ticktock, ticktock, ticktock.
Where's Frost?
We're leaving.
Where is he?
8:17 AM, FRIDAY
Stay here! Stay here! Wait! Don't move!
Go!
Get in the trunk.
You're serious? Yeah. Get in.
- The trunk? - Get in the trunk, now!
Ops Center.
- Echo Three Victor Echo Nine. - Go ahead.
This is Weston. Seven- R's been hit. Everyone's dead.
translation.es: Habla Weston. Atacaron 7-R. Todos están muertos.

translation.en: I need you to repeat that, please. Say again.
Kiefer, his team, everyone, they're all dead.
Stand by.
- Transferring. -
-  It's the house. -  Off- line. Protocol two.
Linklater. This is Weston.
The safe house has been breached.
What's your location?
Um, I'm eastbound on Albert Road. I'm just passing Woodstock.
translation.es: Voy al este sobre Albert. Estoy pasando Woodstock.

translation.en: I want eyes on this. Real- time sat feed.
And what's the location of the guest?
We escaped.
- Clarify. Do you have the guest? - Yes! We escaped!
Look, I can make it to the consulate.
translation.es: ¡Sí, nos escapamos! Puedo llegar al consulado.

translation.en: There's no chance for S.D.R. I think I might have picked up a tail.
translation.es: No estoy seguro, pero creo que me siguen.

translation.en: We can't have a gun battle in front of the consulate.
Diplomatic catastrophe.
Where's that satellite feed?
Denied by National Recon. War theater use only.
translation.es: Nos la negaron. Es sólo para guerras.

translation.en: Buy us some time.
Do not go to the consulate.
Follow protocol Alpha Zero.
Secure the guest and stay off the grid.
translation.es: Controle al invitado y siga invisible.

translation.en: Reconnect at 1800 hours. I repeat: Stay off the grid.
translation.es: Reconecte a las 1800 horas. Repito, siga invisible.

translation.en: Copy. Copy. Copy.
All right. Cape Town police have responded to the house.
translation.es: La policía respondió a la casa.

translation.en: - Confirmed. -  I want the site secured.
-  I'm hearing nine dead. - Initiating damage control.
translation.es: Hay nueve muertos. Iniciando control de daños.

translation.en: I'm on it. Reaching out to N.I.A. now.
translation.es: Estoy en eso. Llamando a Inteligencia Nacional.

translation.en: The locals are gonna have that house locked off.
Check all the traffic cameras, police reports.
translation.es: Revisen cámaras de tráfico, reportes policíacos.

translation.en: Find out why Frost wanted to go into that consulate to begin with...
translation.es: Averigüen por qué fue Frost al consulado...

translation.en: and who in the hell else might be after him.
We need to get Weston and Frost out of South Africa.
Do we have any tactical teams? Anything in play?
Yeah, I have assets in Egypt, but they're in deep.
If I pull them out, that would compromise two years' worth of work.
translation.es: Si los saco, arriesgo dos años de trabajo.

translation.en: I can scramble a team from Europe or Asia, but it's gonna take at least 18 hours.
translation.es: Mandar gente de Europa o Asia... ...tomaría por lo menos 18 horas.

translation.en: At this point, Weston is all we got.
translation.es: En este momento, Weston es lo único que tenemos.

translation.en: I need to find out who this Matt Weston is right now.
translation.es: Necesito saber quién es Matt Weston, ahora.

translation.en: Matthew James Weston.

translation.es: Nacido el 24/02/82, hijo de Terry y Madeline Weston...

translation.en: to Terry and Madeline Weston, Port Washington, New York.
translation.es: Nacido el 24/02/82, hijo de Terry y Madeline Weston... ...en Port Washington, Nueva York.

translation.en: An assault arrest one month after both parents and a younger sister...
translation.es: Un arresto después de que sus padres y una hermana...

translation.en: were killed in a traffic accident...
translation.es: ...murieron en un choque. Nivel de alcohol del padre...

translation.en: in which his father's blood alcohol was twice the legal limit.
translation.es: ...murieron en un choque. Nivel de alcohol del padre... ...era dos veces el nivel legal.

translation.en: Yale. Degree in economics. Recruited out of Yale Law.
translation.es: Yale, estudió economía, reclutado de la facultad de derecho.

translation.en: High marks in analytical and linguistics at the Farm,
translation.es: Sobresalió en lenguas y análisis en la Granja.

translation.en: excellent in tradecraft skills.
His girlfriend, Ana Moreau, is a French national.
translation.es: Su novia, Ana Moreau, es francesa.

translation.en: Out. Get out. He reported them as having close and continuing contact
translation.es: Él reportó que tenían contacto continuo y cercano.

translation.en: She's a second- year resident in the oncology department at Groote Schuur.
translation.es: Ella es residente de oncología en Groote Schuur.

translation.en: Get in that car.
She accepted a position with Hôtel- Dieu Hospital in Paris. Starts in two weeks.
translation.es: Aceptó un puesto en el hospital Hotel-Dieu en París en 2 semanas.

translation.en: No known political affiliations. She's clean.
translation.es: No tiene afiliaciones políticas. Es inocente.

translation.en: I want you to post a car outside their apartment. Use back channels.
translation.es: Pon un auto afuera de su apartamento. Clandestinamente.

translation.en: And get N.S.A. to cross- check their telephone records and their e- mails, please.
translation.es: Y que Seguridad Nacional compare llamadas y correos.

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.
1:13 PM, FRIDAY
You know, it'd be easier if I knew where we were going.
translation.es: Sería más fácil si supiera a dónde vamos.

translation.en: You just drive, all right? Just drive. Middle lane.
translation.es: Sólo maneja, por el carril del medio.

translation.en: All right.
Hey, what are you doing? Middle lane.
- Just drive around. - All right. I'm driving.
translation.es: Sigue manejando. Está bien. Estoy manejando.

translation.en: Nice to know who you're talking to. What's your name?
translation.es: Me gusta saber con quién hablo. ¿Cómo te llamas?

translation.en: You crushed my windpipe.
Well, you locked me in the trunk.
translation.es: Tú me metiste en la maletera.

translation.en: Come on. You're not N.O.C.
translation.es: No te dieron un nombre falso. Usas el verdadero.

translation.en: You're here under your real name. What is it?
translation.es: No te dieron un nombre falso. Usas el verdadero. ¿Cuál es?

translation.en: Weston, Matt. Oh, all right.
How long you been a safe house keeper?
translation.es: Weston, Matt. ¿Cuánto llevas de guardia aquí?

translation.en: Twelve months. Happy birthday.
Cape Town, that's low- level detail. You should've been out of here by now.
translation.es: Ciudad de Cabo. Es nivel bajo. Ya deberían haberte trasladado.

translation.en: Maybe I requested the assignment.
Or maybe Langley doesn't trust you with anything else.
translation.es: Quizá yo pedí el puesto. O quizá no te tienen mucha confianza.

translation.en: So, what's your plan?
Oh, let me guess. Follow protocol.
Protocol states that if your house is crashed,
translation.es: El cual dice que si penetran en tu casa...

translation.en: you do an S.D.R. to make sure no one's following you,
translation.es: ...manejas para asegurarte que nadie te siga.

translation.en: activate your G.P.S. in your go bag, select another safe house.
translation.es: Activas tu GPS y escoges otra casa segura.

translation.en: You think I'm gonna let you just take me in?
translation.es: ¿Crees que voy a dejar que me entregues?

translation.en: I think you need to shut up.
I think you need to consider how your house was attacked in the first place.
translation.es: Necesitas considerar cómo atacaron tu casa.

translation.en: Have you done that, Matt?
They followed Kiefer. They followed him from the consulate.
translation.es: Siguieron a Kiefer desde el consulado.

translation.en: And that's how they found the safe house. You don't really believe that.
translation.es: Así la encontraron. No crees eso, ¿verdad?

translation.en: How did they know I was near the consulate in the first place?
translation.es: ¿Cómo supieron que yo estaba cerca del consulado?

translation.en: But I like this, you know-- you and me figuring shit out.
Like, uh, the Hardy Boys.
translation.es: Esto me gusta, resolverlo juntos. Como niños detectives.

translation.en: That house was a secure location.
translation.es: La casa era un lugar seguro.

translation.en: Whoever crashed it didn't stop by a gas station...
translation.es: El que la atacó... ...no fue a una gasolinera a preguntar cómo llegar.

translation.en: and ask for directions to the nearest safe house.
translation.es: ...no fue a una gasolinera a preguntar cómo llegar.

translation.en: They were invited. Someone told them, Matthew. Think about it.
translation.es: Los invitaron. Alguien les dijo, Matthew. Piénsalo. Alguien que conoces.

translation.en: Someone you know. So you better ask yourself: Can you trust your landlord?
translation.es: Piénsalo. Alguien que conoces. Así que pregúntate: ¿confías en tu casero?

translation.en: Go ahead. You're not gonna get in my head. I already am in your head.
translation.es: No te voy a hacer caso. Ya me hiciste caso.

translation.en: They're gonna isolate you, Matt. They're gonna be real nice to you at first.
translation.es: Te van a aislar, Matt. Primero van a ser amables.

translation.en: They're gonna put their arm around you...
translation.es: Te van a abrazar y a decir cosas como:

translation.en: and tell you things like, You did a decent job, son.
translation.es: Te van a abrazar y a decir cosas como: Hiciste un buen trabajo. Déjalo en nuestras manos.

translation.en: We'll take it from here. That's when you know you're screwed.
translation.es: Hiciste un buen trabajo. Déjalo en nuestras manos. Entonces estás frito.

translation.en: Forget about me. They're gonna focus on you.
translation.es: Se van a concentrar en ti.

translation.en: They're gonna try and make a connection between you and I,
translation.es: Van a tratar de conectarnos a ti y a mí.

translation.en: so that if this all goes wrong,
they'll have something to fall back on in their little Senate hearings.
translation.es: ...tienen en qué apoyarse para sus audiencias del senado.

translation.en: I'm not your only enemy tonight.
translation.es: No soy tu único enemigo hoy.

translation.en: So it's someone in- house.
It's the only way this thing could've happened.
translation.es: Sólo así pudo haber pasado esto.

translation.en: We were completely buttoned up.
I want a list of everyone who knew about this.
translation.es: Quiero una lista de los que sabían.

translation.en: Backgrounds, affiliations, particularly any connections with Frost.
Every movement, right up until this operation.
translation.es: Todos sus movimientos hasta esta operación.

translation.en: Your extraction team, how long had they been together?
My team had been together six months. Why?
Well, I'm just trying to get my head around this.
That'll do. Thank you.
STANDARD HOTEL PAROW, WESTERN CAPE
Hello. Hey.
Baby, where are you?
I'm all right. I'm okay. I'm okay.
translation.es: No pasa nada, estoy bien. Estoy bien.

translation.en: I'm sorry I didn't call you back. I saw your missed calls.
translation.es: Perdón por no llamarte. Vi tus llamadas.

translation.en: You must be worried sick. Is everything okay?
translation.es: Has de estar muy preocupada. ¿Está todo bien?

translation.en: I'm good. I'm good. Listen. Um--
This sounds so crazy.
translation.es: Te va a parecer una locura.

translation.en: We had some threats against the clinic last night,
so Parker and I, we stayed all night trying to get to the bottom of it.
translation.es: Parker y yo pasamos toda la noche investigando.

translation.en: I'm sorry that I didn't call you back. I should have right away.
translation.es: Perdón por no llamarte. Debería haberte llamado.

translation.en: I was so worried. I know.
translation.es: Estaba muy preocupada. Ya lo sé.

translation.en: Can you do me a favor? Can you go over to the window for a second?
translation.es: ¿Me haces un favor? ¿Puedes ir a la ventana?

translation.en: Why?
translation.es: ¿Me haces un favor? ¿Puedes ir a la ventana? ¿Por qué?

translation.en: Can you just take a-- Just take a quick look out the window.
I want you to see if there's anyone out there. Any, uh--
translation.es: Mira a ver si hay alguien afuera.

translation.en: Are there any cars that don't belong, anything?
Anyone hanging around out front?
There's a police car.
What's going on? I'm sorry about this.
I know this is a lot,
but they felt like it would be best if we didn't go home as a precaution.
translation.es: ...pero dijo que no deberíamos ir a casa como precaución...

translation.en: I agree with them. There's nothing to worry about, but I agree with them.
translation.es: ...y le dije que sí. No hay de qué preocuparse.

translation.en: I think you should just go to Dena's for a little while, just for a few hours.
translation.es: Deberías irte con Dena un rato...

translation.en: I'll call you in a little bit, and we'll, you know-- we'll--
we'll get together, okay?
Okay, I'll go.
Okay. All right. I love you.
translation.es: Bueno, te quiero. Nos hablamos pronto.

translation.en: I'll talk to you soon, all right? Don't worry, okay?
translation.es: Bueno, te quiero. Nos hablamos pronto. No te preocupes. Adiós.

translation.en: Okay, bye.
5:23 PM, FRIDAY
She know what you do for a living?
The girl on the phone. It was a girl, wasn't it?
translation.es: La chica del teléfono. Era una chica, ¿no?

translation.en: Maybe it was a guy, I don't know.
I don't judge.
You can't expect to have a real relationship in our line of work, Matthew.
translation.es: No puedes tener una relación de verdad con este trabajo.

translation.en: Don't worry. She's not gonna leave you.
See, what happens is you try to protect her with lies,
translation.es: Pasa lo siguiente: tú tratas de protegerla con mentiras...

translation.en: and then it starts to add up.
At the safe house, you said that they'd kill me to get to you.
translation.es: Dijiste que me iban a matar para agarrarte.

translation.en: - After a while, even the truth starts to sound like a lie. - Why?
translation.es: Al rato, hasta la verdad... -¿Por qué? -...suena a mentira.

translation.en: You have something. You got something that they want.
What is it? A local girl?
translation.es: Tienes algo que quieren. ¿Qué es? ¿Es de aquí?

translation.en: - Don't worry about her. - Oh, it is a girl.
translation.es: Olvídala. ¿Qué es? Sí es una chica.

translation.en: You'll keep covering your tracks.
translation.es: Seguirás borrando tus huellas y ella seguirá creyéndote.

translation.en: She'll keep believing, because she wants to, because she needs to.
translation.es: Seguirás borrando tus huellas y ella seguirá creyéndote. Porque quiere, porque necesita creerte.

translation.en: That's why we exist, you and me. That's our job.
translation.es: Por eso existimos tú y yo. Ese es nuestro trabajo.

translation.en: To take advantage of that--
people's desire to believe.
translation.es: El deseo de la gente de creer.

translation.en: To trust.
She's not gonna leave you, Matthew.
You're gonna leave her.
I'm not you.
He's your boy. You take it.
Everybody stand by.
-  - Matty, it's me.
How you holding up?
Copy that. Stand by.
Matt, we can't get another team in for at least 12 hours.
translation.es: No puedo enviar otro equipo hasta dentro de 12 horas.

translation.en: Sorry.
We've cleared a new safe house for you outside the city.
translation.es: Tenemos otra casa segura afuera de la ciudad.

translation.en: There's a go bag located at locker number 256,
translation.es: Tenemos otra casa segura afuera de la ciudad. Hay un maletín en... ...el casillero 2-5-6, Estadio Greenpoint, estación del metro.

translation.en: Green Point Stadium, Metrorail station.
translation.es: ...el casillero 2-5-6, Estadio Greenpoint, estación del metro.

translation.en: The combination: 2- 5- 1- 22.
Now, the bag's got a G.P.S. in it.
It'll direct you to the safe house.
But you gotta be careful. It's an active location.
translation.es: Ten cuidado. Es un lugar activo.

translation.en: So approach with caution.
Matt?
Uh, do you-- Do you know how they found Frost? You know who led them to us?
translation.es: ¿Saben cómo hallaron a Frost? ¿Quién los dirigió a la casa?

translation.en: We're working on that.
We're counting on you, Matt.
Get Frost to that safe house and you can write your own ticket.
translation.es: Lleva a Frost a la casa y te darán el puesto que quieras.

translation.en: I will.
I will.
Left at the light.
translation.es: A la izquierda en el semáforo.

translation.en: To the stadium?
Yeah.
Hey, scarf. How much for the scarf?
Fifty rand, sir.
Thanks.
Cuff your hands together. Together?
Yeah.
Out.
Are you sure you don't wanna just walk away from this?
translation.es: ¿Seguro que no quieres huir y ya?

translation.en: Can't do that. Yes, you can. You should.
Go. Across the street.
Going to the game. I like games.
translation.es: Vamos al juego. Me gustan los juegos.

translation.en: Metrorail, straight ahead. Straight ahead.
Right over there.
Let's go.
- Help! Help! Help! He's trying to kidnap me! -  Whoa, whoa, whoa!
- He's trying to kidnap me! Help! Help! -
- He's got a gun! - I'm undercover. I'm a policeman.
Help!
He's got a gun! He's got a gun right there!
I'm undercover. No. I'm undercover.
- I'm undercover. - If you calm down, sir. Everybody calm down!
Get down! Get down!
Okay! All right! Okay! Okay!
I arrested that man. He's a murderer.
translation.es: ¡Yo arresté a ese hombre! ¡Es un asesino!

translation.en: Get up! Get him up! Get up!
I don't know what he-- what he-- what he--
translation.es: ¡Yo soy americano! No sé qué quería él de mí.

translation.en: Calm down, all right? Just calm down.
You don't understand. that man is extremely dangerous.
Hey, hey, hey, hey! I'm a police officer. I'm from America.
translation.es: Soy un policía. Soy de EE.UU.

translation.en: I arrested this man. His name is Tobin Frost. Where did you take him?
translation.es: Yo arresté a este hombre. Se llama Tobin Frost. ¿A dónde lo llevaron?

translation.en: He's in the infirmary.
There! There! There! Is that it? Top left!
Second screen from the top. Look. Look. The infirmary.
All right. Go back.
Third- tier infirmary now! Move!
Third- tier infirmary. Go now!
You see?
Don't move.
Suspect now spotted,
on the southwest upper deck.
translation.es: Sospechoso detectado... ...en el piso superior suroeste.

translation.en: Alert on lower concourse. Suspect sighted passing yellow block 228.
translation.es: Alerta en la explanada de abajo.

translation.en: Frost!
Stop! Stop!
- Get out of the way! - Stop!
Stop!
No! Stop!
Medic!
Drop the gun.
I'm responsible for you.
translation.es: Suéltala. Yo soy responsable de ti.

translation.en: You're responsible for yourself.
Get on your knees.
You gonna kill me?
I only kill professionals.
7:53 PM, FRIDAY  Height, approximately six fee.
Anglo, wearing a stadium security jacket.
translation.es: 7:53 PM, VIERNES Blanco, con chaqueta de guardia.

translation.en: The suspect was last seen entering Green Point Stadium Metrorail, stadium concourse.
translation.es: Blanco, con chaqueta de guardia. El sospechoso entró en la estación Estadio del metro. Explanada del estadio.

translation.en: Sir, we have a thread on what Frost might be doing in Cape Town.
translation.es: Quizá averiguamos lo que hacía Frost en Ciudad del Cabo.

translation.en: - Uh, can you-- Can you bring up-- - Yeah.
Alec Wade. Fifteen- year NOC at MI6.
translation.es: Alec Wade, 15 años de agente del MI6.

translation.en: Sabotage, counter- ambush, counter- I.E.D. tactics,
until he blew up an op in Lisbon four years ago and was put on a desk, pushing papers.
translation.es: Sabotaje, contraemboscadas, tácticas anti explosivos... ...hasta que voló a un agente y lo volvieron oficinista.

translation.en: Cape Town police found him shot through the head.
translation.es: Lo encontraron con un tiro en la cabeza.

translation.en: High- powered rifle. Fourteen blocks from the consulate.
translation.es: Un tiro de rifle a 14 calles del consulado.

translation.en: Witnesses placed someone fitting Frost's description...
translation.es: Testigos vieron a alguien parecido a Frost...

translation.en: in the car at the time of the shooting.
And we think what? That they were working together?
Well, they ran joint operations in Hamburg, mid- '80s.
translation.es: Colaboraron en Hamburgo en los años 80.

translation.en: Frost's last sighting was in Hamburg, 2011.
translation.es: Frost fue visto en Hamburgo en 2011.

translation.en: And what are the Brits saying about Wade?
Hmm, officially they're saying nothing.
Unofficially?
He's been the subject of a five- month internal investigation.
They think he's been trading intel. Hmm.
So what the hell did Wade leak to Frost...
that was so important it was worth killing six of our men?
translation.es: ...que valía la vida de seis hombres nuestros?

translation.en: I want more details from MI6. - Call in every chit you got. - Yes, sir.
translation.es: Quiero más detalles del MI6. Cobra todos tus favores.

translation.en: And, David, I want an internal investigation of Daniel Kiefer and his team.
translation.es: Sí, señor. David, investiga a Daniel Kiefer y su equipo.

translation.en: - I've got Weston calling in for David Barlow. -  Everyone, stand by.
translation.es: Llamada de Weston para David Barlow.

translation.en: I lost him.  Frost?
Yeah, he's gone.
After I picked up the G.P.S., he created a diversion,
translation.es: Al recoger el GPS creó una distracción...

translation.en: took out a couple of cops at the stadium.
translation.es: ...y mató a dos policías en el estadio.

translation.en: -  Any idea where's he's headed? - Not exactly, but I will.
translation.es: ¿Sabes a dónde va? No, pero lo averiguaré.

translation.en: This is Linklater. You said he took out two cops?
Matt, you're on speaker.
Yes, ma'am. At the Green Point Stadium.  ...involvement in a possible kidnapping.
The suspect is being described as a white male of medium build--
translation.es: Describen al sospechoso como un hombre blanco.

translation.en: Stadium police is reporting you shot a cop.
translation.es: Reportan que usted mató a un policía.

translation.en: I returned fire in self- defense.
translation.es: Reportan que usted mató a un policía. Disparé en defensa propia.

translation.en: Look. The fact of the matter is Frost is on the loose.
translation.es: El hecho es que Frost anda suelto.

translation.en: I've spent the last 14 hours with him.
translation.es: Pasé las últimas 14 horas con él.

translation.en: He might have said or done something that could lead me to him.
translation.es: Quizá dijo algo que me llevará a él.

translation.en: You are to stand down, proceed to the consulate,
and present yourself for exfil and debrief. Acknowledge.
By the time I'm debriefed, Frost will be gone.
translation.es: Para cuando acabe, Frost va a desaparecer.

translation.en: I've spent 12 months researching every square inch of this town.
translation.es: Llevo un año estudiando a fondo esta ciudad.

translation.en: I will find Frost, and I'll deliver him.
translation.es: Encontraré a Frost y lo entregaré.

translation.en: Weston, this is Harlan Whitford, son.
Now you've done a fine job, but we'll take it from here.
translation.es: Hiciste un buen trabajo. Déjalo en nuestras manos.

translation.en: Understood.
Hello?
Sir, I respectfully request that that exchange not make it onto his files.
translation.es: Solicito que esa conversación no se incluya en su expediente.

translation.en: He's either incompetent, or he's working with somebody else.
translation.es: Es incompetente o trabaja para otros.

translation.en: Do not make this about Weston.
David-- It was your guys that lost Frost. It was your team folded at the safe house.
translation.es: Tu gente perdió a Frost. Tu equipo perdió la casa.

translation.en: I want both of you on an airplane to Cape Town.
translation.es: Váyanse los dos a Ciudad del Cabo.

translation.en: Frost is trying to get out of the country. Go find his ass.
translation.es: Frost quiere salir del país. Encuéntrenlo.

translation.en: 8:37 PM, FRIDAY
There you go, baby.
One ticket to Jo'burg.
Thank you.
Police have detained American N.G.O. worker Matthew Weston..
translation.es: La policía había detenido al americano Matthew Weston...

translation.en: as a possible suspect in the shooting.
Weston had been detained earlier today,
translation.es: Weston había sido detenido antes hoy...

translation.en: but had managed to escape while being questioned by police--
translation.es: ...pero escapó al ser interrogado por guardias del estadio...

translation.en: The suspect has been described as a white male of medium build,
translation.es: ...sobre su participación en el tiroteo. El sospechoso es un hombre blanco de estatura mediana...

translation.en: possibly wearing a stadium security outfit.
Baby.
Are you all right?
I lied to you.
About everything. The N.G.O., Parker,
translation.es: Acerca de todo, de la ONG y Parker.

translation.en: my job,
my family.
So who do you work for?
The government.
No, no. I don't--
translation.es: Para la CIA. No, yo no...

translation.en: I don't do anything. I sit-- I--
I sit around in an apartment all day. I answer the phone.
translation.es: Me quedo en un apartamento, contesto el teléfono.

translation.en: I need you to leave.
I need you to do that for me. Okay?
translation.es: Necesito que me hagas ese favor.

translation.en: Here.
This is a ticket to Jo'burg.
When you get there, you go straight to the airport.
There's a 6:00 a.m. flight to Paris.
translation.es: A las 6 a.m. hay un vuelo a París.

translation.en: Take this.
You take this. If anyone stops you--
translation.es: Toma esto. Si alguien te para...

translation.en: If anyone stops you-- If anybody stops you--
translation.es: Si alguien te para, si alguien te para...

translation.en: Who do you think I am?
Stop! Stop! Fuck you!
Hey. Stop. Stop it.
We broke up a week ago. You haven't seen me since, okay?
translation.es: Rompimos hace una semana y no me has visto.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
Just leave. Please?
- Do you love me? - Very much.
Go. Go.
Go.
Attention, all passengers, platform 20 for Langa Township,
translation.es: Atención. En la plataforma 20, el tren al municipio de Langa...

translation.en: departing in five minutes.
Langa Township, departing in five minutes.
translation.es: El tren a Langa saldrá en 5 minutos.

translation.en: Sir, someone just logged into our system...
translation.es: Alguien entró en el sistema con la contraseña de Weston...

translation.en: using Weston's password, accessing his stored files.
translation.es: Alguien entró en el sistema con la contraseña de Weston... ...y se metió en sus archivos.

translation.en: It's him. What the hell's he doing?
I want to see what he's looking at.
He's pulled an old report on surveillance targets...
living in the Langa Township area.
translation.es: ...sobre los blancos bajo vigilancia en Langa.

translation.en: It's a profile of Carlos Villar, a Nicaraguan national.
translation.es: Es un perfil de Carlos Villar, nacido en Nicaragua.

translation.en: He's a known document forger.
-  Get me a copy of Weston's report. -  Yes, sir.
translation.es: Consígueme una copia del reporte de Weston. Sí, señor.

translation.en: Oh, shit. Logged off, sir. He's gone.
An Internet café on Long Street.
translation.es: Un café de internet en la calle Long.

translation.en: LANGA TOWNSHIP CAPE TOWN
translation.es: MUNICIPIO DE LANGA CIUDAD DEL CABO

translation.en: - The black Dorian Gray. - That's right.
How you doing, brother?
Come in. Yes, sir.
Illana.
Hi. We have a guest.
Illana. Good to meet you. Joseph. My daughter.
translation.es: Illana. Mucho gusto. Esta es mi hija.

translation.en: How are you? Hello.
My son- in- law.
-  -  May I offer you some tea?
Uh, no. We're going upstairs.
I remembered.
You even let it breathe.
Too long a sacrifice can make a stone of the heart.
translation.es: Un sacrificio muy largo puede endurecer el corazón.

translation.en: O when may it suffice?
That is heaven's part.
In the old days, a cheap bottle of Flor de Caña kept us happy all night.
translation.es: Antes, una botella de Flor de Caña nos alegraba toda la noche.

translation.en: Mmm. Tastes change.
People change.
People don't change.
We grow old.
And some of us adapt...
and learn how to enjoy simple pleasures of life,
translation.es: Disfrutamos de los pequeños placeres de la vida...

translation.en: like a family, a home.
And for you,
what's in that glass right now, for you, is as good as it's ever gonna be.
translation.es: Lo que tiene esa copa, para ti, va a ser tu mayor placer.

translation.en: One day you'll understand...
you got more past than future. You'll learn.
translation.es: Reconoces que tienes más pasado que futuro. Aprendes.

translation.en: What is this? An intervention?
I thought you were dead.
So, what brings you to my home in the middle of the night after all these years?
translation.es: ¿Qué te trae a mi casa a la mitad de la noche... ...después de tantos años?

translation.en: Uh- huh? We're going.
Okay, be careful. Okay, Papa.
What are you gonna do with this?
translation.es: PAGOS CLANDESTINOS A OTRAS AGENCIAS ¿Qué vas a hacer con esto?

translation.en: Gonna make some money.
Let me borrow your glasses.
That's it. Listen.
I'm gonna need a new passport, photo I.D., driver's license, the whole shebang.
translation.es: Necesito un pasaporte nuevo, identificación, licencia de manejo...

translation.en: Can you do that for me?
Yeah.
You sure?
Yes.
Weston never showed at the consulate.
And he was just accessing our secure server,
translation.es: Weston no llegó al consulado. Se metió en nuestro servidor seguro...

translation.en: searching for someone to create an alias package.
translation.es: ...en busca de alguien para crear un alias.

translation.en: He's trying to leave the country.
Or he's going after Frost.
Look at what happened at the soccer stadium.
translation.es: Mira lo que pasó en el estadio.

translation.en: This guy let Frost escape.
I think Weston's turned.
I know this boy.
He's been looking for a chance to prove himself.
translation.es: Ha estado tratando de demostrar su valía.

translation.en: He's trying to bring in Frost.
Come on, David. You're not seeing the evidence.
translation.es: Por favor, David. No estás viendo la evidencia.

translation.en: Not my best work,
but given the pressure of time, it's passable.
translation.es: No es mi mejor obra... ...pero dada la prisa, es aceptable.

translation.en: It's good. I'll wire you the money as soon as I get out of town.
translation.es: Está bien. Te mandaré el dinero de fuera.

translation.en: Tobin, don't do this. It's different.
translation.es: Tobin, no hagas esto. Es diferente.

translation.en: You don't need the trouble. You don't need the money.
translation.es: No necesitas los problemas ni el dinero.

translation.en: - You can give it-- -
-  Carlos! - Illana!
Carlos!  Illana!
Carlos.
Go.
Vete. Go.
- He's on the roof! -
Go! Go!
Get in the car!
They think they can come at me like this.
Have to do a whole lot better than that.
Shit!
Yeah, Matt, how'd you find me?
It wasn't that hard.
Let's go.
Wait, wait, wait, wait.
Who do you work for?
Who sent you?
Who sent you? Who sent you?
Vargas. Huh?
Vargas.
Who's Vargas? Who's Vargas?
You wanna die? Huh?
Who's Vargas?
Matt.
C.I.A.
C.I.A.! C.I.A.!
6:17 AM, SATURDAY Report?
There was a shoot- out in the Langa Township.
Two crime scenes. One at the residence of Carlos Villar.
translation.es: Hubo un tiroteo en Langa. En dos lugares. La casa de Carlos Villar.

translation.en: He's a document forger. The other, a nearby tenement.
translation.es: Falsifica documentos. El otro en una vecindad cerca.

translation.en: And where was Frost last seen? Tenement.
Have fun at Villar's.
translation.es: En la vecindad. Diviértete con Villar.

translation.en: We'll meet up later.
You were right about Ana.
That's her name.
Sorry to hear that.
Most case officers get married three, four times.
translation.es: La mayoría de los especialistas se casa 3 ó 4 veces.

translation.en: You?
Once.
You're falling apart over here.
Don't kill innocent people, Matthew.
What?
Air traffic controller. Tiny airstrip in Bermuda.
translation.es: Un controlador de tráfico aéreo, una pista en Bermuda.

translation.en: George Edwart Cox. I remember that name.
Edwart, with a T.
My inside officer said, uh, he was organizing arms shipments,
translation.es: Mi oficial dijo que organizaba cargamentos de armas.

translation.en: but he was just an air traffic controller. He was just a guy.
translation.es: Pero sólo era un controlador, un tipo normal.

translation.en: I put a bullet in his skull.
Black ops came in, they replaced him with one of their own,
translation.es: Llegaron los de Ops Negras, lo reemplazaron...

translation.en: crashed a Gulfstream in the ocean that night.
translation.es: ...y estrellaron un jet en el océano.

translation.en: Thing was, the family that was on the plane--
translation.es: La familia que estaba en el avión...

translation.en: husband-- he was a whistle- blower.
Whole thing was about...
stopping him from testifying about wet works...
to a congressional hearing.
That's why you left. No.
I went back to work the next day like nothing ever happened.
translation.es: Me reporté al día siguiente como si nada.

translation.en: You practice anything a long time, you get good at it.
translation.es: Si practicas algo mucho tiempo te vuelves bueno.

translation.en: You tell a hundred lies a day, it sounds like the truth.
translation.es: Si dices cientos de mentiras suenan a verdad.

translation.en: Everyone betrays everyone.
That's a shitty excuse.
Yeah, I used to be innocent like you.
translation.es: Sí, yo era inocente como tú.

translation.en: Wrap myself up in the flag.
I'm gonna take you in.
Good for you.
- Barlow. -  So, witnesses identified a pair of men...
translation.es: Barlow. Testigos identificaron a dos hombres como Weston y Frost...

translation.en: fitting Weston and Frost's description leaving this location together.
translation.es: Testigos identificaron a dos hombres como Weston y Frost... ...saliendo juntos de este lugar.

translation.en: - So he pulled it off. - Weston is aiding and abetting a fugitive.
translation.es: Tuvo éxito. Weston está ayudando a un fugitivo.

translation.en: You're wrong.
If he's with Frost, he's taking him to the safe house.
translation.es: Está llevando a Frost a la casa segura.

translation.en: That's where we gotta be.
Fine. Fine.
Meet me at the crossroads at Old Malmesbury Road.
translation.es: Nos vemos en el cruce de Old Malmesbury.

translation.en: 11:43 AM, SATURDAY
Who are you?
You Weston?
Give me the shotgun.
What the hell is this? Who are you?
I'm Keller. Safe house keeper.
translation.es: Soy Keller. El guardia de la casa segura.

translation.en: Authorization index: Bravo Four Seven Oscar Whiskey Six.
Inside. Let's go.
Left.
Slowly.
I don't know who trained you, man, but this sure as hell ain't protocol.
translation.es: ¿Quién te entrenó? Esto no sigue el protocolo.

translation.en: Where's the guest room?
Well, that's the thing. We don't really have one.
In there. In there.
Cuff him. To the pipe.
Out. Over there.
All right.
Control room.
Whatever you say, man. It's your rodeo.
translation.es: Lo que tú digas. Es tu fiesta.

translation.en: Call it in. Let me hear it.
Landlord. My guest is here.
Account? Abaresque Limited.
With a guest? Yeah, package delivered.
Confirmed. Pickup scheduled.
All right. They're on the way.
Can we at least put the gun down now?
Thanks, Clayton. Bye.
It's a microchip.
What?
That was my guy from MI6. Wade got his hands on a microchip.
translation.es: Era mi contacto del MI6. Wade tenía un microchip.

translation.en: And what was on it? Only Wade knew.
But I think it's safe to assume that's why he hooked up with Frost-- to sell it.
translation.es: Sólo Wade sabía. Pero seguro que por eso se reunió con Frost. Para venderlo.

translation.en: Let's get moving.
Long day, huh?
Yeah. I can only imagine. With Tobin Frost.
That man's a legend.
I hope you picked up something. I mean, you ain't gonna find a better education.
translation.es: Ojalá hayas aprendido algo. Es la mejor educación posible.

translation.en: You know, this is the most excitement I've seen.
translation.es: Es lo más emocionante que me ha pasado.

translation.en: You're the first guest I've had in 10 months.
translation.es: Eres mi primer huésped en 10 meses.

translation.en: But you wouldn't know anything about that now, right?
translation.es: Pero tú no tienes idea de cómo es eso.

translation.en: You got a city posting.
translation.es: Pero tú no tienes idea de cómo es eso. Tu puesto era una ciudad.

translation.en: Yeah, nightlife, beaches,
little ladies running around everywhere.
Yeah.
I'm jealous.
You got coffee?
Yeah, yeah. It's in the cupboard. Where?
Want me to go get it? I got it.
Why are-- Why are you in Cape Town?
translation.es: ¿Por qué viniste a Ciudad del Cabo?

translation.en: You tell me now. Why?
What is-- What is it?
Dirt list, laundry list.
Israeli Intelligence, five years ago, compiled blackmail intel.
translation.es: La inteligencia israelí juntó información para chantajear.

translation.en: Corrupt agents, German intelligence, MI6.
translation.es: Son agentes corruptos, espionaje alemán, MI6.

translation.en: C.I.A.?
translation.es: Son agentes corruptos, espionaje alemán, MI6. ¿La CIA?

translation.en: Yes.
We gotta get away.
We-- We gotta get outta here.
Ah, shit.
Don't-- Don't, don't, don't.
Don't. No. Don't-- Don't leave me here, please.
translation.es: No me dejes aquí, por favor.

translation.en: Don't-- Don't do it, please. Please.
translation.es: No me dejes aquí, por favor. No me dejes.

translation.en: Matt?
Hey.
How you doing?
I'm proud of you.
And what you pulled off.
You're gonna make a hell of a case officer.
translation.es: Vas a ser un excelente manejador de casos.

translation.en: Where's Frost?
Ah, he's gone.
Place is a wreck. And blood everywhere.
translation.es: La casa está deshecha. Hay sangre en todas partes.

translation.en: Was he injured or--
I guess you know he killed Keller.
I killed Keller.
Frost killed Keller.
He killed Linklater too.
Did he talk about anything? Any-- Anything he was after?
Anything he might have had?
File.
A file?
The file that you're on.
translation.es: El archivo en el que estás.

translation.en: Along with a lot of other people. Important people.
translation.es: Junto con mucha gente más. Gente importante.

translation.en: Listen to me. What would you do...
if someone is watching your every move--
translation.es: ...si alguien vigilara todo lo que hacías?

translation.en: some maybe you're not proud of,
translation.es: Cosas de las que no estás orgulloso.

translation.en: and you will have some you're not proud of, believe me--
translation.es: Y va a haber cosas de las que no estarás orgulloso.

translation.en: and then tries to use it against you?
You'd do what you have to do.
You'd do what you have to do.
Where's the file?
Matt, the file. Where is the file?
You're a dead man.
Yeah. A long time now.
Frost is here.
translation.es: Sí, desde hace mucho. Frost está aquí.

translation.en: Let's go.
We got him.
A hell of a job.
You smell that, huh?
That Pinotage is a good grape. Great wine, yeah.
Local grape, Pinotage. Great--
translation.es: Una uva local. El pinotage es excelente.

translation.en: I don't want you losing this one.
This is worth a lot of money.
You-- You're a good boy, Matty. You- You--
You know what you are?
I know what you're not.
translation.es: Yo sé lo que no eres.

translation.en: You're better than me.
No, it's okay. Just... be better than me.
translation.es: No, está bien. Sólo sé mejor que yo.

translation.en: You promise me.
Yeah.
Well, let's- let's- let's- let's--
Let's-- Let's go.
I just gotta get up. I need to get up.  No, just--
translation.es: Sólo me tengo que levantar. Necesito levantarme.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah.
Just-- Just stay.
Hey.
C.I.A HEADQUARTERS LANGLEY, VA
translation.es: CUARTEL GENERAL DE LA CIA LANGLEY, VIRGINIA

translation.en: That's, uh, exactly as it happened.
translation.es: Eso fue justo lo que pasó.

translation.en: Well, obviously this situation needs to be handled with a certain amount of finesse.
translation.es: Hay que manejar esta situación con delicadeza.

translation.en: Has anybody else seen this report?
No, sir. Not yet.
Matt, I'm sure this comes as no surprise,
but parts of this report are gonna have to be altered for national security.
translation.es: Tenemos que alterar partes del reporte por seguridad nacional.

translation.en: Which parts, sir? Well,
David Barlow can't be held responsible for what happened to the safe house.
translation.es: David Barlow no puede ser responsable de lo que pasó en esa casa.

translation.en: We just don't need the scandal.
But, sir, you and I both know that that's just not the truth.
translation.es: No necesitamos el escándalo. Pero los dos sabemos que no es la verdad.

translation.en: People don't want the truth anymore, Matt.
translation.es: La gente ya no quiere la verdad.

translation.en: It's too messy. Keeps them up nights.
translation.es: Es desagradable. No la deja dormir.

translation.en: I tell you what I am willing to do though.
I think the Agency has grossly underestimated you,
translation.es: Creo que la agencia te ha subestimado.

translation.en: and I'm recommending you for a senior case officer position.
translation.es: Te voy a recomendar para manejador superior de casos.

translation.en: Provided you still want it.
translation.es: Te voy a recomendar para manejador superior de casos. Si todavía lo quieres.

translation.en: That's a generous offer, sir.
There's just one thing you need to clarify for me.
Of course.
Frost may have been carrying some vital intel.
A file.
I'm not seeing that anywhere in this report.
translation.es: No veo eso en el reporte.

translation.en: What was on the file, sir?
Something that, quite frankly, could be very damaging to the Agency and to our allies.
translation.es: Algo que podría ser muy dañino para... ...nosotros y nuestros aliados.

translation.en: I don't see why Frost would even mention something like that to me.
translation.es: No entiendo por qué Frost me mencionaría algo así.

translation.en: No, I suppose he wouldn't, would he?
You realize though that if that file did leak,
translation.es: Pero si ese archivo saliera a la luz...

translation.en: what would happen to the person responsible.
That person would be arrested, sir.
He'd be risking everything.
He'd have enemies in every intelligence agency in the world.
translation.es: Tendría enemigos en todas las agencias de espionaje.

translation.en: In the eyes of the C.I.A., he'd be just like Tobin Frost.
translation.es: A los ojos de la CIA, sería igual que Tobin Frost.

translation.en: Frost didn't say anything about a file, sir.
translation.es: Frost no dijo nada de ningún archivo.

translation.en: All right, son.
Take a few days off.
We'll get you started next week.
Thank you.
And, uh, think about our conversation, would you?
Will do.
I'll take it from here, sir.
Media outlets received a controversial file from an anonymous source.
translation.es: ...y otras agencias noticieras... ...recibieron un archivo controversial de una fuente anónima.

translation.en: The international intelligence community is still reeling...
translation.es: El mundo de la inteligencia está aturdido...

translation.en: from the release of so many highly classified documents...
translation.es: ...por la revelación de tantos documentos secretos...

translation.en: and the revelations of widespread corruption...
translation.es: ...y la enorme cantidad de corrupción y actividad criminal...

translation.en: and criminal activity at the C.I.A., the B.N.D.--
translation.es: ...y la enorme cantidad de corrupción y actividad criminal... ...en la CIA, el BND y el MI6.

translation.en: ...is in an uproar over the lack of oversight given to British Intelligence,
translation.es: ...en la CIA, el BND y el MI6. El parlamento protestó por la falta de supervisión...

translation.en: demanding accountability of the rogue agents.
translation.es: ...exigiendo que se castigue a los corruptos.

translation.en: Officials at MI6 are fully cooperating--
translation.es: Los oficiales del MI6 están cooperando.

translation.en: Chancellor Merkel insists that the B.N.D....
has already identified the corrupt agents and contained the intelligence breach.
translation.es: ...conoce a los agentes corruptos y que no se revelarán más secretos.

translation.en: She has ensured her international counterparts--
translation.es: Ha asegurado a otros líderes internacionales...

translation.en: ...indictments are now expected within the week, and that Congress...
translation.es: ...que se levantarán cargos en menos de una semana.

translation.en: has demanded that Deputy Director Harlan Whitford...
translation.es: El congreso exigió que el subdirector Harlan Whitford...

translation.en: testify before a Senate subcommittee,
in an effort to determine how many people at the C.I.A. are involved in this...
translation.es: ...para determinar cuánta gente está involucrada en esto...

translation.en: and just how far up the corruption reaches.
PARIS, FRANCE
